title: Wide slab serif
content:
I've tried Identifont and MyFonts searches for Wide Slab Serif, Lubalin, Stymie, College as my various search terms. Anyone recognize this one?  
\

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [WhatFont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150115070147/http:/typophile.com/files/WhatFont_2.jpg) | 36.09 KB |
author: kristin

comments.content: It must be **[United Serif Ext (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150115070147/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries&ffam=United%20Serif%20Ext%20-%20Medium&fid=2a613eff6cd2de17d6d654e3b2b1ffb9&fsize=48&text=INTO%20GREAT%20CROFT&wrap=2)** by House Industries
